Routine that reads entries from _Syncindex Table from the DMS database
based on those entries it wil execute the Full sync autoline Pipline to sync the data in that table

sqlReaderQuery.value:
-- This query selects active sync instructions from [_SyncIndex].
-- If the 'linkedServer' column is '**', it acts as a wildcard: apply this sync rule to all linked servers.
-- It LEFT JOINs to [_SyncLinkedservers] to resolve '**' into actual server names.
-- However, it excludes any servers that already have an explicit sync rule (an "overrule") defined for the same sourceTable + targetTable.
-- This ensures '**' acts as a fallback and does not override specific server-level configurations.
-- The CASE logic selects either the explicit linked server or the one joined from [_SyncLinkedservers].
-- Only rows with active = 1 are considered for syncing.

select si.sourceTable, 
	case when si.linkedserver = '**' 
	then sl.linkedserver 
	else si.linkedServer 
	end as linkedserver 
      ,si.[targetTable]
      ,si.[addedFilterSource]
      ,si.[addedFilterDestination]
	  ,si.clearBeforeLoad
from [dbo].[_SyncIndex] si
left join [dbo].[_SyncLinkedservers] sl on si.linkedServer = '**' 
		and sl.linkedserver not in (select distinct linkedserver 
									from [dbo].[_SyncIndex] overrule 
									where overrule.sourceTable = si.sourceTable 
										and overrule.targetTable = si.targetTable 
										and overrule.linkedServer <> '**')
where active = 1 and schedule = '@{pipeline().parameters.schedule}';

activities.description:
‚úÖ Summary: Trigger Sync runs DMS
This pipeline automates batch execution of the "Full sync Autoline DMS" pipeline based on records from the _SyncIndex control table.

üß© Core Steps
Lookup Tables to Sync:
Queries the _SyncIndex table to find all active entries (active = 1) that define which source tables to sync.

Resolves Wildcard ** Entries:

If linkedServer = '**', the pipeline expands the row into one sync job for each active linked server, except those explicitly overridden.

This is handled via a LEFT JOIN with the _SyncLinkedservers table and exclusion logic to avoid duplication.

ForEach Table to Sync:
Loops through all resolved sync instructions and triggers ‚ÄúFull sync Autoline DMS‚Äù in parallel batches, passing:

sourceTable, targetTable

Optional filters

The correct linkedServer (resolved from wildcard or explicit)

clearBeforeLoad flag

üõ† _SyncIndex Configuration Options
The _SyncIndex table lets you control sync behavior per table and per server:

Field	Description
sourceTable	Autoline source table (e.g., GB.locat)
targetTable	Azure SQL target table (e.g., autoline_companylocations)
linkedServer	Set to a specific server (autoline7) or use ** to apply to all active servers not explicitly listed
addedFilterSource	Optional SQL WHERE clause for filtering source data
addedFilterDestination	Optional SQL condition for controlling what data gets deleted before insert
active	Only rows with 1 are executed
clearBeforeLoad	Set to 1 to skip PK-based deletes and clear all data before loading

üß™ Wildcard Example (**) Explained
Example row:
   sourceTable: GB.locat  
   targetTable: autoline_companylocations  
   linkedServer: **  
   active: 1  

This entry tells ADF:

Sync GB.locat ‚Üí autoline_companylocations

For all active linked servers not already explicitly mapped in _SyncIndex

Unless another row with a specific linkedServer is found for the same sourceTable + targetTable
